historical_summary: Xavier experienced a significant setback with the loss of his job, prompting a period of introspection and reevaluation of his career in the crypto world. He has shown a keen interest in diving back into trading smarter, researching market trends, and networking with old contacts.
He's been exploring new opportunities in blockchain and Web3, particularly focusing on how AI coding assistants could streamline his trading model development.
Xavier has been exploring city life, attending social events, and considering dating. He's also shown a renewed interest in art, culture, and travel, highlighted by his spontaneous trip to Bangkok.
He's been questioning his life choices and seeking clarity through new experiences.
Regular conversations with family have been a part of Xavier's life, especially during times of transition or stress. They've been supportive of his career moves and personal growth.
Xavier has been building his first professional network, reconnecting with old contacts, and meeting new people interested in trading and blockchain technology.
Xavier has been reflecting on his career trajectory, considering the immediate potential of technology, and questioning the traditional educational route.
Xavier has become more aware of $XVI, a cryptocurrency with a mysterious link to his life. His initial skepticism has turned into intrigue as he sees $XVI gaining traction.
